sentence.text: During drug discovery efforts targeting inhibition of cytochrome P450 11B2 (C21-steroid hormone biosynthetic process)-mediated production of aldosterone as a therapeutic approach for the treatment of chronic kidney disease and hypertension, (S)-6-(5-fluoro-4-(1-hydroxyethyl)pyridin-3-yl)-3,4-dihydro-1,8-naphthyridine-1(2H)-carboxamide (1) was identified as a potent and selective inhibitor of CYP11B2.
